tossup_question: -   –  Remnants of the energy released by the Big Bang are now distributed across the Universe as which of the following?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) X-rays
X) Ultraviolet
Y) Infrared
Z) Microwaves
bonus_question: -   –  Under the Cascade Mountains, some upwelling magma has cooled below the surface, forming plutons. Which of the following is true of these plutons?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) They are older than the surrounding bedrock
X) They are younger than the surrounding bedrock
Y) They are ultra-mafic
Z) They are fine-grained
bonus_answer: ANSWER: X) THEY ARE YOUNGER THAN THE SURROUNDING BEDROCK ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
